body:
Haven't seen anything like this on the fourms... Let's go.

Hello! I am Enflaming, and I am here to talk and discuss CS:GO. I have won one competitive match so far.

I have a gun I wish to trade. If any of you wish to make a trade with me (or just in general), comment below and I'll try and keep a running record on this post about guns people wish to trade.

Trades:
  • Enflaming- P2000, Ivory, Minimal Wear


(hoping this isn't considered spam, but I suppose lock if it is...)

replies.body:
Hey!  I'm currently silver elite master :D 127 wins. 
I'm good with the m484,ak47,and when I feel good I'm amazing at awping and ssging. 
Being the dumb person I as I spent my money on skins on cases that I only got blues on.  I HIGHELY recommend using steampowers.com to build up a small little inventory. It's takes about 10 minutes to get a 50 cent item. 
 Add me,  evan2783
http://www.steampowers.net?join=790690
Also,  when you start steampowers.com,  can you PLEASE use this link to sign up it gives me like 50 cent I think. Thanks
Birdy
